mapper.insert: insert into ts_course (cno, name, hour, credit, address, dept_no, begin_week, end_week) values (#{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{credit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ts_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hour = #{hour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, credit = #{credit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_no = #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_week = #{beginWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_week = #{endWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER} where cno = #{cno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cno, name, hour, credit, address, dept_no, begin_week, end_week from ts_course
